name: Escape the Mental
description:
Your frinds told you about this old, haunted mental hospital. They tell you to go check it out one night, and so you did....

When you walked in the front doors, they slamed behind you, and locked.

You must find a key to unlock the door before it's to late!

READ THIS!

Keep in mind, that this is an early access, there is no final ending, and all the jumpscares are not placed!
